column1: “When we’re dancing with the angels the question will be asked... what did we do to make sure we kept our democracy intact?”  -Elijah Cummings (1951-2019)

Happy Holidays from my family to yours. While we have a a few days to take a breath spend time with family and recharge our batteries for the challenges ahead I wanted to share this quote from my friend Elijah Cummings. https://t.co/RYx7VZXAkS
Yesterday I voted to impeach President Trump for abusing the power of the Presidency and for waging an unprecedented campaign of obstruction against Congress.  https://t.co/WR0EgpcfPX

At the Annual Democratic Clubs Holiday Party we discussed the progress we’ve made this year and all that we are looking forward to achieving in 2020 -- including grassroots organizing to win back the Senate and the White House!

I enjoyed celebrating the holiday season this weekend with friends from the Columbia Democratic Club Ellicott City & Western Howard Democratic Club Thurgood Marshall Democratic Club and Young Democrats of Howard County. https://t.co/0JdfCvypAL
In Hampden I joined Baltimore residents for the 47th Annual Mayor's Christmas Parade. I was really impressed with this year's parade balloons and exhibits! https://t.co/aVZmcLQp79
Happy Thanksgiving from me and my family to you and yours. https://t.co/qwRzsOZdko

The For The People Act will expand access to the ballot box create clean and fair elections crack down on lobbyists expose foreign money in our politics protect the right to vote strengthen our election security and fight big money in politics - once and for all.

Frontline Democrats know that Americans want to clean up our political system and that's why they're running on #HR1 a historic bill to clean up corruption in Washington and return to government of by and for the people.  https://t.co/UzjnVSiPQg
This week I was invited onto Lawrence O'Donnell's show The Last Word to discuss the ongoing impeachment inquiry. https://t.co/jLVK8cr6QZ

Today we come together to honor our nation’s veterans. It’s our duty to do everything possible to make sure that the brave men and women who serve our country receive the health care education job opportunities and benefits that they deserve. https://t.co/GexXmw8rym
Don't miss your chance to help decide which local student's design will be on Maryland's new 'I Voted' sticker in 2020! Vote now through Nov. 15th for your favorite designs.  https://t.co/aY8AD9V9G3

Thanks Cal for hosting @TiffanyMueller @StopBigMoney and me for a great conversation about how we can fight big money in our politics and return to gov’t of by and #ForThePeople. You’re a true champion of reform!
.@CalforNC knows that if we want to make progress on the issues that people care about most we need to clean up the #CultureOfCorruption in Washington. https://t.co/hpOPVOYO6J
I had a great time at @Steuart_Pittman's Annual Party. Really enjoyed spending time with residents from across Anne Arundel County. https://t.co/XE5FrJU2LA

Congratulations to @SenBillFerg on becoming Maryland's next Senate President. I've had the opportunity to see Bill's leadership on a day-to-day basis and I'm excited about the new role he will play in sustaining progress for our state.

Even as his time as Senate President comes to an end I know that Senator Miller will continue to guide Maryland forward as he works with his Senate colleagues to make life better for all Maryland residents.
He put hardworking families first by building up Maryland's transportation system safeguarding our Chesapeake Bay and standing up for our children's public education.
Mike Miller’s leadership of the Maryland Senate for more than thirty years has provided tremendous benefits for our state.

It is a challenge to all of us that we should never let lack of educational opportunity deprive an individual of his or her full potential: "Ladies and gentlemen we cannot afford to have anybody grow up to be almost seventy years old talking about what they could have been!"
The end of his story gets me every time.
I loved listening to Elijah's stories and was lucky to hear a lot of them over the years. But this was one of my favorites - and that's why I recorded it with my iPhone at a community event.
Please listen to Elijah tell this amazing story about his Dad on the day Elijah was sworn into Congress. https://t.co/uXPayNZciU
We will keep his memory alive.

Elijah was a mentor and close friend. I am devastated by his passing. My deepest sympathies go out to Elijah’s wife Maya Rockeymoore Cummings Elijah’s family and friends and all those who have been graced by Elijah's life of service.
Elijah dedicated his life to public service working every single day to improve education health care and economic opportunity — not only in Baltimore but across Maryland and for the entire country.
Today we lost a true American patriot and a fierce champion of the voiceless. https://t.co/UkAsGoMuDz
During this time of introspection and atonement I wish the Jewish community a meaningful fast. From my family to yours G’mar Chatimah Tovah.
My colleagues and I in the House of Representatives will vigorously investigate the White House and gather all relevant facts through an impeachment inquiry.
President Trump admitted that he illegally attempted to coerce a foreign government to interfere in the 2020 election. This is a gross abuse of power — impeachable conduct.
#AskAboutDemocracy https://t.co/dZzwCYXi1J
We will follow the facts and get the full truth. No one is above the law.

As a member of the House Oversight and Reform Committee I will work alongside the Judiciary Committee and the courts to investigate the President and hold the Trump Administration accountable to the American people.
I support the effort by the House Judiciary Committee to codify procedures for an impeachment investigation of President @realDonaldTrump.
Today may we remember the victims of the 9/11 attacks and pay tribute to our heroic first responders. The memory of those who perished will never be forgotten.
Proud to earn the endorsement of @StopBigMoney a key ally in our fight to clean up corruption in Washington and return to government of by and for the people! https://t.co/llQQNQtaJj
